ï»¿OFFI01AL 61 DOCUMENTS AMENDMENT to the Administration Arrangement between the Netherlands Minister for Development Cooperation and the World Bank Project: Energy Sector Cleanup and Land Reclamation Project Ministers' Internal Identification Number: 23651 World Bank Trust Fund number: TF071961 Whereas the Netherlands Minister for Foreign Trade and Development Cooperation of the Kingdom of the Netherlands (formerly the Minister for Development Cooperation) (the "Minister") and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development ("IBRD") and the International Development Association ("IDA") (collectively referred to as the "Bank") concluded the Administration Arrangement for the above -referenced Project "Energy Sector Clean-Up and Land Reclamation in Kosovo (the "Administration Arrangement"). Whereas developments relating to the Project justify amendment of the Administration Arrangement mentioned, Now therefore, the Minister and the Bank decide to: 1. Extend the Closing Date: The seventh paragraph of the Administration Arrangement shall be deleted in its entirety and replaced to read as follows: "The Grant may be used to finance expenditures for the Project commencing on October 11, 2012 and ending on June 30, 2014 (Closing date). The Minister has agreed that the Bank is allowed to make disbursements up to six (6) months after the Closing Date incurred on or before that date, in accordance with the Bank's applicable policies and procedures." Other terms of the Administration Arrangement remain unchanged. Signed in duplicate in English,
ï»¿For the Mi 'For the Bank: Authoriz esent ive 5Athorized Representative Mr. Stephan Raes Ellen A. Goldstein Minister (Economic) Country Director for Royal Netherlands Embassy Southeast Europe Washington, DC Europe and Central Asia Region The World Bank Washington, D.C. Date: Date: 20i /
